messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563
Could you please tell me who you’re referring to? I need either the contact’s name or their person_id to update the phone number.

I’ll need some way to identify which contact to update. Could you share anything you recall about that person—such as their name (even part of it), relationship (e.g. “coworker,” “sister”), or old phone number? Any detail that lets me find the right entry.
I don't have any more details.

I’m afraid I can’t identify which contact to update without some way to distinguish them. Would you like me to pull up a list of your contacts so you can pick the right person? Once you let me know which entry you want to change, I can update the phone number for you.
I don't have access to a list right now.

I’m sorry, but I can’t safely update a contact without at least one identifying detail (name, person_id, or something unique). Once you’re able to look up or recall even part of their name, relationship, or existing number, just let me know and I’ll apply the new phone number for you.
